Chapter 6 Other great resources As mentioned, this is but one way of doing things, and I have scraped it together based on the incredibly useful resources others before me have made available. Here are some of the ones I have found most helpful. Lucy’s blog post Angela Li’s thread Rosanna van Hespen’s blog series Chester Ismay’s thesisdown package and examples (see other people’s adaptations within, as well!) Hope is to incorporate our Western template eventually! Ed Berry’s blog post Tyson Barret’s blog post TJ Mahr’s dissertation materials RStudio community post on thesis writing knitr examples academicWriteR: an R package of helper functions for writing manuscripts
